name: Well Count
description:
Oil and gas well data from Enverus summarized within a 20 kilometer-squared area multivariate grid. Summarized values include total number of wells, wells by status, wells by age using 10 year bins, and wells by total vertical depth using 2,500 ft bins. Summary layers provided in this application are derived from proprietary layers and do not always contain key features (e.g., age, status, or depth) and therefore might not be shown when data are queried for those features.

Acquired from: Enverus, 2021 Wells. Retrieved from https://www.enverus.com/; Lucy Romeo, Isabelle Pfander, Michael Sabbatino, Maneesh Sharma, Daniel Amrine, Jennifer Bauer, CO2-Locate, 3/31/2023, https://edx.netl.doe.gov/dataset/co2-locate

Feature dataset (category): Spatial_Summaries

Date acquired: 9/7/2022
copyrightText: Enverus, 2021 Wells. Retrieved from https://www.enverus.com/; Lucy Romeo, Isabelle Pfander, Michael Sabbatino, Maneesh Sharma, Daniel Amrine, Jennifer Bauer, CO2-Locate, 3/31/2023, https://edx.netl.doe.gov/dataset/co2-locate
